message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses the critical issue of firewall configuration in SCADA networks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). The proposed approach involves automation and simplification of policy design, which relates to software engineering (cs.SE) and system design (cs.SY). The use of automated checks and validation also suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) in the approach.
